title: raybucks
author: raybucks
content: people who control the world like they want or institutionsplease give thoughts

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: The WEF plays a big part in control of the world & ordinary people like ourselves. There are many conspiracy theories & you might sound like a lunatic if you suggest them to people in your real life but most of them end up coming true.Bill Gates has suggested the world population is too large & needs culling. Covid was made in a Chinese lab & released to help usher in The Great Reset. Klaus Schwab even wrote a book on it.Then we have big banks, institutions, governments, people like Rothschild. The world is a mess & the people in true power are sickos.

comments.author: Quintony
comments.body: You'll never know the puppeteers, as they say the rabbit hole is deep

comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on January 07, 2023, 04:36:02 PMThe WEF plays a big part in control of the world & ordinary people like ourselves. There are many conspiracy theories & you might sound like a lunatic if you suggest them to people in your real life but most of them end up coming true.Bill Gates has suggested the world population is too large & needs culling. Covid was made in a Chinese lab & released to help usher in The Great Reset. Klaus Schwab even wrote a book on it.Then we have big banks, institutions, governments, people like Rothschild. The world is a mess & the people in true power are sickos.What do you mean by „most of them end up coming true“? Do you have a ‚non-lunatic‘ example?

comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 03:18:10 PMpeople who control the world like they want or institutionsplease give thoughtsThey are Bad People as one thing for sure ..

comments.author: Zeemol
comments.body: I think those who control everything are in the shadows

comments.author: RogoLui
comments.body: Money rules the world and human greed

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Our CREATOR is the Ultimate controller/ruler... humans control is as important as what the CREATOR allows. To understand how the CREATOR actually Rules you need to watch the paths followed by rivers. Imagine the rivers are humans(or destinies) while the paths they follow were made for people who deserve the paths.   So, a human leader who leads others through a path would think he is in control while in fact he is only following the path made for those who choose such path. And you can only be on the Right or Wrong Path.Those who control the world are only controlling what they are allowed by the CREATOR to control. You won't be wrong if you call it a false sense of control

comments.author: Okereke
comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 03:18:10 PMpeople who control the world like they want or institutionsplease give thoughtsI will say people that control the world are the money bags. Because they have so much money, they can easily influence their environment through their business and financial power.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well, ever since 2019 disease prevention organizations control the world.  Two examples are the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). These organizations make world rules about what we can and cannot do. This was built in during the covid pandemic because at any time they choose our lives can be changed. For example, if they decide we need another "lock down." They also have the power to decide if certain businesses are allowed to stay open or not. There are those who choose not to live by the rules and that is another subject itself. Just that controls the food chain, the population and spreading a virus that somehow will eliminate the human population.

comments.author: RogoLui
comments.body: The topic is very interesting, but we are unlikely to find out about it

comments.author: tuertezii
comments.body: Quote from: raybucks on January 07, 2023, 03:18:10 PMpeople who control the world like they want or institutionsplease give thoughtsWhoever is the richest in this world is the one who controls the world, that is, the one who is transforming the world. There is no need to think about it at all. Controlling money is equivalent to controlling the whole world. Think about which organization is the richest in the world?

comments.author: Voloviko
comments.body: The richest control the world, he who owns the money owns the power
